item.title: Shopping List
item.description: Here I’m planning to post a list of interesting items in different categories. This list may include affiliate links. These links provide me a kickback without any extra cost at your end. Notice a broken link? Let me know! WiFi ¶Relays ¶ Shelly (EU/US) 1, 1PM, 1L, 2.5, RGBW2, Dimmer2, Uni, Plug, Plug S Sensors ¶ Shelly (EU/US) i3, EM, 3EM, Uni, Humidity & Temperature, Door/Window 2, Flood, Smoke, Gas Remotes ¶ Shelly Button1 (EU/US) Light bulbs ¶ Shelly (EU/US) Bulb, Vintage, Duo Zigbee ¶Controllers and hubs ¶ Dresden Elektronik ConBee II (Amazon US/DE) Sonoff Zigbee 3.

item.title: Privacy Statement
item.description: Last update: 2021-12-21 Who we are ¶Our website address is: https://sequr.be. For any queries related to this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, e-mail privacy@sequr.be. What personal data we collect and why we collect it ¶IP address ¶The use of an IP address is inherent to how the internet works. When you visit the website, your IP address may end up in the logs of the webserver(s) hosting this website and – if applicable – that of Content Delivery Networks (CDN) used to cache the website.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello World! ¶I guess I will someday have to write some bio about myself here. For the moment, I suggest you have a look at @DezeStijn and form your own opinion about me. Use Signal, use Tor Disclaimer ¶All opinions expressed here and on my social media profiles are solely mine and do not reflect those of my employer. Retweets and mentions of products do not constitute endorsement of any position, product, or service.
